sentences.sContent: He tapped out an article on the typewriter.
sentences.sContent_eng: He tapped out an article on the typewriter.
sentences.sCn: 他用打字机打出了一篇文章。

sentences.sContent: Look at the keyboard of any standard typewriter or computer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Look at the keyboard of any standard typewriter or computer.
sentences.sCn: 看看任何标准的打字机或计算机的键盘。

sentences.sContent: He took all afternoon on each one of them, on account of having to hunt for each letter on the typewriter.
sentences.sContent_eng: He took all afternoon on each one of them, on account of having to hunt for each letter on the typewriter.
sentences.sCn: 他每写一篇都花上整整一个下午的时间，因为他得在打字机上寻找每一个字母。

remMethod.val: type(打字) ＋ writer(复写器) → 打字机

words.tran: 用打字机打出的，打字的
字型；铅字样；打字机字体
用打字机打（typewrite的现在分词）

trans.tranOther: a machine with keys that you press in order to print letters of the alphabet onto paper
